summary: Advanced Kill Moves unlocks every stable kill move to every fitting weapon or weapon combination.
descriptionHtml:
This mod unlocks all stable killmoves to all fitting weapons or weapon combination.

[color=red][size=80]DON'T CLEAN THIS MOD IN TESVEDIT[/size][/color]
The Identical to Master edits are intentional and needed for the mod to work.

My other mods:
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52716/?]MoveShake[/url]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Ovr8A.png[/img]
[list][*]Unlocks every stable animation to every fitting weapon or weapon combination.
[*][s]Unlocks kill moves to: left hand attacks, left hand power attacks, dual attacks and dual power attacks.[/s]
[*]Avoids decapitations with Maces and Warhammers[/list]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/9uS06.png[/img]
3.0e
[list][*]Fixed some bugs in mcm menu.
[/list]
3.0d
[list][*]There were still some leftovers from version 2.0b and a drity edit.
[/list]
3.0c
[list][*]Added option to disable mod.
[*]Added option to disable VATS ( INI Setting: bVATSDisable ).
[*]Added option to set the loop rate of the random chance generator
[*]Removed "ViewMode" option for killcam.
[*]Removed leftover from version 2.0b.
[/list]
3.0b
[list][*]Restored camera features.
[/list]

After I tested the features and before I uploaded the mod I cleaned it withh TexVEdit.
That was a big mistake, because it completely destroys some of the camera features.
Don't ever clean this mod with TesVEdit XD.

3.0
[list][*]Scrapped all additional features and concentrated on core-features ( killmoves, killcams )
[*]Added MCM Configuration Menu
[*]Removed AKM Book completely
[/list]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/f6ReI.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cfywaHZ.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/9C75S.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/A9PPB.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0q0e2.jpg[/img]

[color=Red]ATTENTION: RANGED KILL MOVES[/color]
With the following settings even ranged mid-combat kill moves are possible.
Basically just copy this into your "skyrim.ini" located under "DocumentsMy GamesSkyrim":

[VATS]
fVATSCastingAfterKillDelay=1.2000
uVATSRangedPercentSneak=100
uVATSRangedPercentGlobal=100
bVATSIgnoreProjectileTest=0
bVATSAllowNoKill=0
bVATSMultipleCombatants=1
bVATSForceRanged=1

[img]http://i.imgur.com/2TPvf.png[/img]
Easiest way is to install with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url].

[img]http://i.imgur.com/SOaon.png[/img]
Download and put the content of the packed data folder into the data folder in skyrim main folder, then activate the file in the skyrim launcher under data files

[img]http://i.imgur.com/eK6px.png[/img]
Just remove the .esp and the two scripts starting with "AKM".

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Q72JY.png[/img]
The mod heavily changes animation- and camera-structure, so I'm afraid it is most likely incompatible to most, if not all, other kill-move-mods.
It should be compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37621/?]Skeleton Killmoves Unlocked[/url]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/2qidX.png[/img]
[list][*]Some kill moves tend to freeze the character after they are finished, especially the strangle from behind. This is also a problem in vanilla skyrim.
[*]Some anmations are still failing sometimes although I removed most of the buggy animations.[/list]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/gOI0o.png[/img]
[list][*]None[/list]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/zEK1Z.png[/img]
[list][*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=232311]Danni[/url] for the idea and different tipps.
[*][url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/user/325100-kuertee]kuertee[/url] for the excellent work with the script that detects game load.
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=4026458]NaCross99[/url] for the french translated string file.
[*][url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/2147741-steelsnap]Steelsnap aka TheWiseCat[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=100354]DJ_Kovrik[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3193061]Bushin1[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/529402]superrandombros28[/url] for keeping this alive and fixing it.[/list]
author: Grasmann
